title: Huge mega mall with Dreamworks and Nickelodeon theme parks is to open outside New York City
text:
Advertisement

A huge mega-mall that features a Nickelodeon theme park and a DreamWorks water park with 35 slides, as well as 450 shops, is set to open next month near New York City.

The complex, called American Dream, is located in East Rutherford, New Jersey - five miles from Manhattan as the crow flies - and will welcome guests from October 25.

It is housed in a three-million-square-foot building, which will also include America's first indoor snow park, a Coca-Cola Experience and have an observation wheel outside.

A rendering of the American Dream mall in East Rutherford, New Jersey, which is set to open on October 25. It is located five miles from Manhattan

The Nickelodeon attraction will officially be called Nickelodeon Universe. It will be home to the world's steepest roller coaster, The Shellraiser, which is based on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

The Nickelodeon attraction, officially called Nickelodeon Universe, will be the largest indoor theme park in the Western Hemisphere when it opens.

It will be home, it's claimed, to the world's steepest roller coaster, The Shellraiser, which is based on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

The ride will feature a vertical lift hill that will take the roller coaster's cars 141 feet up into the roof, where riders will get a glimpse of the New York City skyline through windows in the building before plummeting down the steepest drop in the world - at 121.5 degrees.

Meanwhile, Nickelodeon Universe will also have The Shredder, the world's tallest and longest spinning coaster, which will reach speeds of over 60mph.

Other rides in the park will be based on Nickelodeon shows including Dora the Explorer, Paw Patrol and Spongebob Squarepants.

In the DreamWorks water park, as well as the 35 slides, there will be the world's largest indoor pool, a lazy river and 31 luxury cabanas that have 'prime views of Manhattan'.

A rendering of the chalets in the Big Snow Ski and Snowboard Park, the first indoor snow park in North America

A rendering of the NHL-regulation ice rink at American Dream. The mall is housed in a three-million-square-foot building

There will also be the longest hygro-magnetic coaster and the tallest indoor body slide at 142 feet, with a 50ft free-fall.

Meanwhile, Big Snow Ski and Snowboard Park, the indoor snow park, will have a 16-storey ski slope, where guests can learn to ski.

There will also be an NHL-regulation ice rink as well as ski chalets for hire.

Other attractions on offer inside the mega mall will include a Legoland Discovery Centre, a Sea Life Aquarium, a CMX luxury movie theater and a performing arts center.

When it comes to dining, there will be over 100 options, including a Coca-Cola food hall and a kosher food hall.

While shops at the mall will include Saks Fifth Avenue, Barneys New York, Hermes, Tiffany & Company and Dolce & Gabbana.

A rendering of one of the 450 stores inside American Dream. Other shops at the mall will include Saks Fifth Avenue, Barneys New York, Hermes, Tiffany & Company and Dolce & Gabbana

Don Ghermezian, president of American Dream, said: 'We know that the community has been eagerly awaiting the launch of this incredible global destination.

'We have a one‐of‐a‐kind property that will reshape the way people think about entertainment, theme parks and shopping and we are so excited to reveal our incredible Nickelodeon theme park, DreamWorks water park and Big Snow Ski and Snowboard Park.'

While Ken Downing, chief creative officer for developer Triple Five Group, added: 'American Dream brings its guests an unrivalled destination for style and fun.

'It’s a unique mix of entertainment (55 per cent) and experiential retail (45 per cent), which will welcome and entertain guests, embracing everyone in a new retail and entertainment revolution, where everything is possible.'
description: The complex, called American Dream, is located in East Rutherford, New Jersey - five miles from Manhattan - and will welcome guests from October 25.
